resources.string: Permissions not enough. Give to the App the needed permissions.

Version 0.3.3 SR 154
Developed by S. Marano, SMH17 all rights reserved. Any replication, modification, reuse of the code or graphic elements even partial is strictly forbidden without explicit permission of the author.

For additional info about copyright and license terms, contact us.
Input the max number of elements, an higher number will allow you to see more results, however the additional results have a less likely match ratio.\nDefault value: 10,
Set the detection quality level (default value: 1200). An higher value could produce more accurate results but is slower.\nQuality value:
Use Cloud for accurate element detection
Use Cloud for accurate text detection
Use Cloud for accurate face detection
Output batch results in source directory
NOTES:\nCustom models must be placed in TFModels folder located in default app folder.\nIn realtime section you can find additional settings about this feature set tapping on top right button.
All results will be logged on a file saved in default folder
Speak out loud best results only
The vocal output will ignore lower confidence results.
Camera flow doesn\'t wait detection frame synchronization
Proportion of the head width to the image width, and the valid value range is [0.0, 1.0]
Minimum face size must be a float value and in the range [0.0, 1.0]

Now you have to choose the path where you want to allow the creation of default App folder.\nIn this folder will be saved results, and custom analysis models.\nThis operation must be done only in first configuration, if in future you want to choose a different path, you can reset it from settings menu.
Cannot use Text to Speech function
Results saved to a local file!
Local detector not yet ready. Try again later if problem persist restart device.
Unexpected error. If problem persists send a bug report.

In your device has been detected a global AdBlocker. Developing and maintaining this App requires resources, time and expenses. We cannot provide all this for free if you block even the Ads. The commands of the App are now disabled. Disable AdBlocker (or whitelist this App) if you want to use the free mode, or alternatively, purchase a Premium subscription.
Result copied to clipboard.\nNo supported search assistants found on your device. Install a supported search assistant (e.g. Google Search) to enable integrated search feature.
Result copied to clipboard.\nNo supported web browsers found on your device. Install a supported web browser(e.g. Chrome or Firefox) to enable direct url opening feature.
Your device cannot handle Camera Intent correctly.\nUpdate your Android version to a newer release or install a camera app with a newer Camera Intent support.
Your device cannot handle Gallery Intent correctly.\nUpdate your Android version to a newer release or install a gallery app with a newer Gallery Intent support.

Enter the URL of the image.

NOTE:
The URL must be a direct link to the image file, not some dynamic web gallery URL.

Invalid URL!

The URL must be a valid direct link to the image file, not some dynamic web gallery URL.
Make sure the URL is reachable and ends with an image extension (for example .jpg, .png, .bmp, .webp, .gif).
Choose a picture from camera or gallery, or enter an image URL.
Cannot load this image. Invalid image or insufficient permissions.
Analyze a picture before using this function.
Something has gone wrong. Some features require an internet connection. Make sure your connection is active and image isn\'t corrupted or try again later.
\nAPI request failed. If the problem persists, make sure to update the App to latest official version available on Google Play.

[The detection switched automatically to local mode due to an error during the attempt to use the Cloud. If the problem persists, make sure to update the App to latest official version available on Google Play.]
This mode requires cloud assisted detection.\nPlease enable cloud mode for this feature set.

This function allows advanced users to use custom inference models to detect elements in identification mode [I] or localization mode [L]. The models must be in TensorFlow Lite compatible format with .tflite extension. Custom models must be placed in TFModel folder and then configured in the settings menu. If no custom model has been configured, IAT will ignore the selection, remaining on a default model. Read documentation for details.

Process multiple images at same time.
This feature works using only local engine, so some features are less accurate than image analysis assisted by cloud available for certain feature set when you use the single image analysis.

Chose the feature you want to use then select the directory you want to process using the red button at the bottom.
This function allows you to search contents of interest leaving only elements whose results match a keyword.\nEnter the keyword.
If you click save button on top, results will be saved in default IAT path, however, in settings you can configure the batch results saving, in order to output results txt in the source directory.
Batch analysis completed.\nClick on each element to see results, long press to copy results on clipboard.
Batch procedure fail.\nMake sure the selected path contains valid image files, or send a bug report using navigation drawer menu if you think it\'s an App error.

The Realtime Detector allows you to detect elements on fly without internet connection. Since this feature uses much simpler neural network models to run with the limited capabilities of mobile devices, the accuracy cannot be in any way comparable to the Cloud based detection. If you need more accuracy, use the others dedicated features.\nIf you use it for the first time, in some case the App needs to configure some device specific dependencies, if you see a blank screen wait and try again later.
The configured model for the Custom detector cannot be used.

Element detector allows you to identify elements within an image, to find information about them. It supports broad sets of categories ranging from inanimate objects to plants and animals.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Detected elements (tap to search info, long tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any element in this picture.
Detected elements in offline mode (tap to search info, long tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any element in this picture.\n\nYou are in local mode, with an internet connection active you can get better results.
Element Detector engine is in English, however you can enable the translation of its results to a target language of your choice in the settings.

Web image detector allows you to find info about the image, searching the Internet for similar images and related web pages, and guessing the content according the grabbed information. This feature provides you the related labels, links of the involved web pages, showing matching and visually similar images (if available), allowing you to save also the respective links or the image files.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Matches found (tap to search info, long tap to copy to clipboard):
◄ Webpages with matched images (click to open): ►
-> Ops! Cannot identify any match for this picture.
To see similar and matching images (if present), swipe the title of link area section (where you can see left-right arrows).

Optical Text Recognition allows you to digitize the text content of an image.

Use the red button at the bottom to load an image and start detection.

Optionally you can specify the mode and the language of the text to identify if known (in some circumstances this improves the results avoiding errors due to incorrect interpretation of the text language autodetection).
Detected text (tap to copy to clipboard, long tap to search content on web):
Detected text in offline mode (tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any text in this picture.
-> Ops! Cannot identify any text in this picture.\n\nYou are in local mode, with an internet connection active you can get better results.
Logo detector allows you to identify logos, to find information about brands and products.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
-> Ops! Cannot identify any logo in this picture.
Landmark detector allows you to identify popular natural and man-made structures, to search info about them or their locality.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Detected landmarks (tap to search info, long tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any landmark in this picture.

Detect multiple faces within an image, along with the associated facial attributes. This function is also able to perform an emotional analysis to determine the emotional state plus It can tell you if the person is wearing headwear.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.

This function allows you to compare resemblance between 2 persons for forensic level identity matching. You have to load 2 different images. In order to get a valid result, each photo must contain a single face where all elements (nose, eyes, mouth etc.) are well visible.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load the first image.

This function returns a raw estimation of the likely age range. In order to get a valid result, the photo must contain a single face where all elements (nose, eyes, mouth etc.) are well visible.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
This function allows you to identify celebrities.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Faces detected (tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any face in this picture.
Faces detected in offline mode (tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any face in this picture.\n\nYou are in local mode, with an internet connection active you can get better results.
Age range estimation completed (tap to copy to clipboard):
Faces compared (tap to copy to clipboard):

-> Ops! Cannot compare faces.
Maybe one of the picture provided isn't good enough.

If you think this is an error, use bug report command in the drawer menu.
Detected high facial similarity with one or more celebrities (tap to search info, long tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any celebrity in this picture.
-> First image loaded!\n\nPlease load a second image for comparison.

Barcode detector can detect almost all types of barcodes.
1D barcodes:
EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code-39, Code-93, Code-128, ITF, Codabar.
2D barcodes:
QR Code, Data Matrix, PDF-417, AZTEC.

Use the red buttons at the bottom to load an image or enter in camera scan mode.
Barcode data detected (tap to copy to clipboard, long tap to search info):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any barcode in this picture.

With colorimeter you can identify all colors within an image and see their representation in RGB, HSB and HEX notation. For each detected color, the app will tell you the name of the color or the name of the most similar color, in case the color tone is uncommon and has no name.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Color analysis result (tap to copy to clipboard):

This tool allows you to check an image to determine if its content could be censored by automatic system or lead to ban. This feature is useful since many social networks and websites perform automatic checks of the uploaded pictures and could take actions against the user if a critical content is detected, and this often erroneously, especially if there are also human reports in addition to suspicious false positives.\n\nUse the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Analysis result (tap to copy to clipboard):
WARNING! A risk factor has been detected. The upload of this picture could cause ban and censorship in many social networks and communities. Pay attention.
Automatic analysis hasn\'t detected risks but it may still be subject to automatized moderation in the most puritanical networks.

This feature allows you to load and extract EXIF info from picture files, if available.
EXIF is a standard for metadata that can include a lot of information as image copyright, the device used, acquisition timestamp, GPS tag data, photo manipulation software used, camera sensor, aperture, focal length, shutter speed, white balance, ISO level etc.
Note:
EXIF data often are removed by services that reprocess the images, so you could find null or inconsistent data if you use this function with images downloaded, for example, from Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram and similar.

Use the red button at the bottom to load an image.
EXIF metadata found (tap to copy to clipboard):
-> Ops! Cannot identify any EXIF in this picture.
-> Ops! Cannot identify any EXIF due to an unexpected error.

This feature generates an error mask, to allow you to spot more easily tampered sections in an image, according the inhomogeneity in the distribution of the error compared to the local pattern.
(A very easy way to familiarize with the tool is to try to alter some images and see how the error mask looks in the altered points.)

Use the red button at the bottom to load an image.
Slide left and right to show analysis mask and original picture. Incoherent error distribution pattern in a specific area indicates the area has been tampered. Use the bar to set threshold.
Ops! An error occurred during the analysis mask generation.\nMake sure the image selected is valid.

FAQ:

Why subscription instead of one time purchase?
-> Because one time purchase cannot be sustainable on long run, each user adds workload to our servers and we have to cover monthly costs.

There are Apps that use servers with no ads and no subscriptions, why your App is different?
-> For some companies is enough to have their app installed to get money, because profile users reselling their data. We respect privacy of the users and haven't any opaque monetization system. This not mentioning the more expensive than average servers needed for the complex neural network based computer vision tasks performed by this app. The price is very low compared to the value this app adds to your device's feature set, however if you don't want to pay subscription, don't worry, the ads in this app are the very least to maintain the service, they aren't spammy and bothering.

Could I cancel subscription if I change my mind in future?
-> Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time from Play Store returning to the full free mode with ads.

Will the subscription price remain the same?
-> The subscription price cannot be changed once a subscription has been activated. It could be changed only for new users that haven't any subscription active. This is the reason why subscribing now at promotional launch price (the lowest possible) It's a bargain.

If I have many devices can I use premium on them all with only one subscription?
-> Of course! The license is linked to your Google Play account and will be automatically applied to all your devices linked to It or that will be linked in future, without any needs of further subscriptions for each device.
Ads mode will be automatically disabled if you purchase a Silver or Gold subscription, and It is enabled if there isn\'t any subscription active.
All features enabled but you will see some ads randomly when you access a new section of this App from the home. (The default free mode)
Monthly premium subscription disables all ads and limitations for the best user experience possible.
Yearly premium subscription disables all ads and limitations for the best user experience possible. Yearly Gold subscription is cheaper than 12 months of Silver subscription.
